param.name: species
param.label: Which species should be used for identification of TIR candidates

param.name: step
param.label: Specify which steps you want to run EDTA
param.help: all: run the entire pipeline (default) \n filter: start from raw TEs to the end.

param.name: cds
param.label: Coding Sequence File
param.help: Provide a FASTA file containing the coding sequence (no introns, UTRs, nor TEs) of this genome or its close relative.

param.name: curatedlib
param.label: Curated Library File
param.help: Provided a curated library to keep consistant naming and classification for known TEs. All TEs in this file will be trusted 100%, so please ONLY provide MANUALLY CURATED ones here.

param.name: sensitive
param.label: Use RepeatModeler to identify remaining TEs
param.help: Use RepeatModeler to identify remaining TEs This step is very slow and MAY help to recover some TEs.

param.name: mutation_rate
param.label: Neutral Mutation Rate
param.help: Neutral mutation rate to calculate the age of intact LTR elements. Default: 1.3e-8 (per bp per year, from rice)

param.name: anno
param.label: Would you like to perform whole-genome TE annotation after TE library construction?
param.help: Perform or not perform whole-genome TE annotation after TE library construction.

param.name: evaluate
param.label: Evaluate
param.help: Evaluate (1) classification consistency of the TE annotation

param.name: exclude
param.label: Exclude
param.help: Exclude bed format regions from TE annotation
